title: Quick Tabs use storage.local not sync
details: Quick Tabs state (`quick_tabs_state_v2`) is stored in `browser.storage.local`, NOT `browser.storage.sync`. User settings (`quick_tab_settings`) are stored in `browser.storage.sync`. When clearing Quick Tabs storage from the options page, always clear from `browser.storage.local` first, then optionally from `sync` for backward compatibility. This fix was applied in options_page.js to the clearStorage(), updateStorageInfo(), showCurrentState(), and exportState() functions.
